level.heading: Allocation of sales tax revenue attributable to the Waterfront Park Retail Area.
level.text: During the contribution period, the sales and use tax revenue attributable to the Waterfront Park Retail Area shall be allocated and deposited into the Waterfront Park Maintenance Fund in the following amounts:

In each 12-month period beginning on each July 1 thereafter that is within the contribution period, an amount equal to $380,000, increased by the increase in the CPI during the period from July 1, 2012, to the beginning of that 12- month period.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 validated a previously made technical correction.
